name: part_006
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion, Nekomata Okayu, and Inugami Korone performing the song 'Mela!'.
Murasaki Shion, Shirakami Fubuki, and Hoshimachi Suisei performing the song '星座になれたら' (Seiza ni Naretara).

subtitles.original: …かっこいい君には…
subtitles.english: ...To the cool you...

subtitles.original: …僕じゃ頼りないのかななんて
subtitles.english: ...Maybe I'm not reliable enough

subtitles.original: そりゃそうだよな だって
subtitles.english: Well, that makes sense, because

subtitles.original: 今もこうして迷ってる
subtitles.english: I'm still lost like this even now

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: 手を取ってくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you take my hand?

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: ギブアンドテイクさ
subtitles.english: It's give and take

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: 君が僕のヒーローだったように
subtitles.english: Just like you were my hero

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない
subtitles.english: Is it not now?

subtitles.original: メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Flaming and boiling

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: The justice hidden even within me

subtitles.original: どうしようもない 衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: Driven by an uncontrollable impulse

subtitles.original: ほら気付けば手を握っている
subtitles.english: Look, I've realized I'm holding your hand

subtitles.original: いったいぜんたい そんなに荷物を
subtitles.english: Why on earth are you

subtitles.original: 背負い込んでどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: carrying so much luggage and where are you going?

subtitles.original: ねえねえ待って 僕にちょっと
subtitles.english: Hey, wait, to me just a little

subtitles.original: 預けてみては
subtitles.english: why not try entrusting it?

subtitles.original: 信じてばかりの僕と
subtitles.english: Me, who does nothing but believe

subtitles.original: 信じることが怖い君と
subtitles.english: and you, who is afraid of believing

subtitles.original: どちらが正しいのかなんて
subtitles.english: Which one of us is right,

subtitles.original: 誰にもわからないさ
subtitles.english: no one can know

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: 僕らだけの世界
subtitles.english: A world just for us

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: ギブアンドテイクさ
subtitles.english: It's give and take

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: 補い合えた暁には
subtitles.english: When we are able to complement each other,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same dream

subtitles.original: 君は隠すと苦しめて
subtitles.english: Hiding it makes you suffer,

subtitles.original: 独りぼっちにさせたのは
subtitles.english: and making you feel all alone

subtitles.original: 少し僕のせいなんだよな ごめんね
subtitles.english: was a bit my fault, I'm sorry

subtitles.original: だけど見るべきはリアルだ
subtitles.english: But what we should look at is reality

subtitles.original: 今こそ僕が助けるんだ
subtitles.english: Now is when I'll save you

subtitles.original: 抱えないで 信じて頼ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Don't bottle it up, I want you to believe and rely on me

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Is it not now? Flaming and boiling

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: The justice hidden even within me

subtitles.original: どうしようもない 衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: Driven by an uncontrollable impulse

subtitles.original: ほら気付けば手を握っている
subtitles.english: Look, I've realized I'm holding your hand

subtitles.original: ほっとけない そんなに荷物を
subtitles.english: I can't leave you alone, carrying so much luggage,

subtitles.original: 背負い込んでどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: where are you going?

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっと 僕にちょっと
subtitles.english: Just a little, to me just a little

subtitles.original: 預けてみては
subtitles.english: why not try entrusting it?

subtitles.original: こんな僕も君のヒーローに
subtitles.english: I want someone like me to also

subtitles.original: なりたいのさ
subtitles.english: become your hero

subtitles.original: ラララ ラララ
subtitles.english: La la la, la la la

subtitles.original: まっすぐ時計は6時
subtitles.english: The clock points straight to six

subtitles.original: 夜空に一番星
subtitles.english: The first star in the night sky

subtitles.original: 影をふんで夜に紛れたくなる
subtitles.english: I want to step on shadows and disappear into the night

subtitles.original: 帰り道
subtitles.english: on the way home

subtitles.original: どんなに探してみても
subtitles.english: No matter how much I search,

subtitles.original: 一つしかない星
subtitles.english: there's only one star

subtitles.original: 何万光年離れたところから
subtitles.english: From tens of thousands of light-years away,

subtitles.original: あんなに輝く
subtitles.english: it shines like that

subtitles.original: いいな 君はみんなから愛されて
subtitles.english: How nice, you are loved by everyone

subtitles.original: いいや 僕は ずっと一人きりさ
subtitles.english: No, I've always been all alone

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 星降る夜 一瞬の願いごと
subtitles.english: A fleeting wish on a night of falling stars

subtitles.original: きらめいて ゆらめいて
subtitles.english: Sparkling, shimmering
